name: Corona Shooter (ajintelligence)
description:
- Fight against corona to save the world!

- If you like Space shooter game, galaxy shooter 
  game, then Virus Shooter is the one you 
  should play.

- Virus Shooter is an arcade shooting game with cool graphics and visuals.

Features:

- It has cool powerups to makes you more powerful.

- Boss fight!

- Global Leader board

- Upgrade yourself in store to make you more 
  stronger.

- Unlock New Levels.

- Be the Best Earth Defender by ranking 1st in the 
  Leaderboard.
